About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My skill are widely spread in the fields of Electrical, Mechanical, Software Development and Development of Purely Mechatronic Systems

Having majored and still improving in quite a few tools as listed on the skills section, I have developed various projects and products, some still in production and others already in market

Together with my team we develop an idea from ground up till we acquire the final product maintainig all the engineering standards-as governed by the various engineering bodies all over the world Client satisfaction is the main driving agenda

Tenanats Management App

Full Stack Developer

This a web based App that keeps all the Tenants records in an apartment, it contains all the attributes needed to satisfactory describe a tenant. Only allow landlords and agents to access the records, it keeps details such as the house no, tenant's contacts, vaccant rooms, whether rent is paid or not, Accounting records for rent collections. It also offers features such as Add a new Tenant,New Apartment, edit details, delete and other records.

Kelarm

Software & Electrical Designer

Kelarm is mobile wireless alarm system, it has a transmitter and a receiver, the transmitter is placed in the items you want to protect and you pocket the receicer, a very small device.The device can provide a range of more than 1km. In case any there is any movements, shock or vibrations where you left the transmitter then immediately in real-time a beep and vibration are triggered on the receiver alerting you on your need for attention.

Events Meetup App

Full Stack Developer

Its a web app built to quickly organize and post meetups for any activities, users can sign up and log in, create meetups,view meetups, edit meetups and also register for meetups they didn't create. When organizing for meetups you add the images, the location and the time of meetup as well us the activities or items to be discussed.
